mapper.select: SELECT p.partyname, p.partyscore, p.createdate, p.logopic, p.coverpic, p.partyprofile, l.localname, h.hobbyname FROM party p JOIN localinfo l ON p.localcode = l.localcode JOIN hobby h ON p.hobbycode = h.hobbycode JOIN partyuser pu ON p.partycode = pu.partycode JOIN userinfo u ON u.email = pu.email WHERE u.email = #{email}
